Replace your boring new tab page with a beautiful new tab page that features a motivational quote alongside beautiful backdrop images.

You can personalize your experience further using the settings menu on the bottom right. Hit enter once you enter in your interests (add as many as you like) and it will cater the background images for you based on those interests.

New with update v1.0.3:
Faster loading for background images
Responsive fix for smaller displays

More features coming in updates :)
